LANGUAGE.TROPARION: Thy martyrs, O Lord, through their sufferings have received incorruptible crowns from Thee, our God. For having Thy strength, they deposed their adversaries and shattered the powerless boldness of the demons. Through their intercessions, save our souls!
LANGUAGE.KONTAKION: Let us honour the noble martyrs, brother and sister in the flesh, the wise Eulampius and Eulampia; for they put to shame the devices of the lawless through the power of Him, Who was Crucified. Therefore, they have been revealed as the glory and boast of martyrs.
